attributes.action: Stop NEW Kurdish Genocide in Kurdistan by Iraqi and Iranian malicious
attributes.additional_details:
Despite the huge international pressure to postpone or cancel the independence referendum in Iraqi Kurdistan, it went ahead and 92% voted yes, with a 72% turnout. We Kurds are the largest “nationality” in the world without our own nation – and we were not going to be deterred from having our say.
Human Rights Watch reported in 1993 on Anfal in Iraq that at least 180,000 Kurds are estimated to have been killed at the hands of the Ba’ath regime.
The world will held responsible for keeping silent!
attributes.background:
The Kurds desperately want freedom – why won’t the free world support them?
Tehran’s military help is not a secret anymore and the Iraqi and Iranian (Shiaa) malicious are on their way to commit a NEW genocide against Kurdish people.
